channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bezos Overtakes Ellison As World’s Third-Richest Person As Oracle Shares Tumble
item.description: Oracle has suffered recently as investors intensify worries about its central role in a potential AI bubble.

item.title: Where Will New Data Center Power Be? And How Will It Work?
item.description: Multi-gigawatt data centers need self-supply, grid backups, revolution.

item.title: Elon Musk’s X Is Fighting A New Social Media War Over The Twitter Brand
item.description: The issue is over copyright and legal usage, but the story could be far more important from a branding standpoint.

item.title: The Most Martian Desert On Earth: The Atacama Desert In Northern Chile
item.description: As the oldest and driest desert on Earth, Chile's Atacama Desert is a treasure trove of discoveries for scientists and tourists alike.

item.title: Why Maintaining A Healthy Weight Isn’t The Same For Everyone
item.description: Obesity is not a single disease. New research shows distinct biological phenotypes that explain why weight gain and treatment response vary so widely.

item.title: The thing about chess
item.description: In a typical tournament, you don’t score any extra points for winning with the fewest number of moves. Quickly isn’t the point.

item.title: Filtering ourselves
item.description: We don’t use the same language or ideas with an in-law that we do with our bar buddies. When the internet was young, people often chose to filter them...

item.title: Better than the cheap alternative
item.description: Frozen pizza changed the game for many pizzerias. If you couldn’t offer something better than what I had in my freezer, what do I need you for? If the...

item.title: Taken for granted
item.description: It’s an odd term, worth a look. We don’t notice that the tree we planted a few years ago thrives just a bit more each day. We don’t notice that the ma...

item.title: Where did kiwi come from?
item.description: And shiitake mushrooms, spaghetti squash, ginger and even packaged tofu? In the 1960s, the culture changed, and so did the supermarket. Small markets ...
